analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3b1d8701397ab3cf86f10b0ef03854cfa06a2fa3.sol#236-238) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(wallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3b1d8701397ab3cf86f10b0ef03854cfa06a2fa3.sol#236-237)

CxNcontract.finalization (/unique_chucks/38/0x3b1d8701397ab3cf86f10b0ef03854cfa06a2fa3.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(wallet,partnerAddress,tokensForPartners) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3b1d8701397ab3cf86f10b0ef03854cfa06a2fa3.sol)

CxNcontract.privSale1end should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3b1d8701397ab3cf86f10b0ef03854cfa06a2fa3.sol#624)
CxNcontract.privSale1start should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3b1d8701397ab3cf86f10b0ef03854cfa06a2fa3.sol#622-623)
